q: How does InstaMarkt's quick commerce work?
a: InstaMarkt connects you with nearby retail stores, allowing you to shop from your favorite brands and receive your order within minutes or the same day.

q: What is the average delivery time?
a: Our average delivery time is under an hour, and in some locations, we offer delivery in as little as 15-30 minutes. Same-day delivery is available in most areas.

q: Can I shop from brands near me?
a: Yes! InstaMarkt partners with local and national retail brands, allowing you to easily shop from stores in your area and support local businesses.

q: How many brands does InstaMarkt offer?
a: InstaMarkt partners with over 5,000 brands, ranging from popular national names to your favorite local stores, so you can find everything you need in one place.

q: What types of products can I find on InstaMarkt?
a: We offer a wide range of products, including groceries, personal care items, electronics, and much more, with thousands of options to choose from.

q: Can I track my delivery in real-time?
a: Absolutely! Once your order is placed, you can track it in real-time on our app or website, so you know exactly when to expect your items.
Delivery fees vary based on location and order size, but we offer affordable rates and frequent promotions to make delivery accessible for everyone.

q: How do I get started with InstaMarkt?
a: Getting started is easy! Download our app or visit our website, create an account, and start shopping from a wide selection of products and brands near you.
